title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Episode 6 – Stops 3 & 4 – Prisoner Distress
description:
April 10, 2017 / The van driver stopped twice, we are told, to check on Freddie Gray, while en route to Central Booking. Very little of the story of these two stops adds up.


Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain, Uncanny Valleys and VYVCH.

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
